### MixedFractionToImproper

Given a mixed fraction represented as an array [a, b, c] where a is the integer part, b is the numerator and c is the denominator, return this fraction as an improper fraction [n, d] where n is the numerator and d is the denominator in their simplified form.

Input: An array of three integers [a, b, c]

Output: An array of two integers [n, d] - the numerator and denominator of the improper fraction in their simplified form.

Example:

```js mixedFractionToImproper([3, 1, 2]) // [7, 2] ```
